com.androidanimator.animation

Class SlideInUnderneathAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.androidanimator.animation.Animation
      • com.androidanimator.animation.SlideInUnderneathAnimation

  • public class SlideInUnderneathAnimation
extends Animation
    This animation causes the view to slide in underneath from its own borders.
    Author:
    SiYao
